category: Personnel, management and administration procedures; Hardware, software or communications equipment and facilities
description: Repository is incapable of effectively determining the extent to which its technical infrastructure and security provisions are capable of facilitating business objectives.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Establish internal means of assessment including risk management
- Seek relevant external certification in order to demonstrate competence
name: Inability to evaluate effectiveness of technical infrastructure and security
notes:
- Does the repository maintain policies and procedures to verify and record attempted security compromises?
- Does the repository maintain policies and procedures to identify non-authorised or inappropriate system interactions?
- Does the repository maintain policies and procedures to ensure the ongoing suitability and functionality of hardware and software technologies and storage media?
- Are mechanisms to determine the effectiveness of technical and security provisions exploited on a regular basis?
preMitigationNotes: - Repository has no mechanisms to test security provisions or to evaluate the effectiveness of technological infrastructure
